amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce by $2.7 billion funding provided for the decennial census.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce by $2,753,253,000, that portion of the appropriation which designates the taking of the decennial census as an emergency appropriation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 257 (Roll no. 374).
